summary: An ex-hood hopes to start a new life under an assumed name in a small town but his past catches up with him when an old crime-buddy asks him to help with a casino heist.
cast: Joseph Cotten|Alida Valli|Spring Byington|Paul Stewart|Jack Paar|Jeff Donnell|John McIntire|Howard Petrie|Frank Puglia|Esther Dale|Marlo Dwyer|Robert Ellis|George Barrows|Ruth Brady|Wheaton Chambers|St. Luke's Episcopal Church Choristers|Frank Clarke|James Conaty|Johnny Duncan|Art Dupuis|Bess Flowers|Joel Fluellen|Joe Gilbert|Kit Guard|Jimmie Horan|Perc Launders|Bert LeBaron|John Merton|John Miljan|Lillian Nicholson|Jack Perry|'Snub' Pollard|Dick Ryan|Syd Saylor|Jack Shea|Charles Sherlock|Brick Sullivan|Florence Wix|Mel Wixon|Barbara Wooddell|Will Wright
keywords: casino heist|handicapped heiress|homosexual subtext|on the lam|hiding out
title: Despacio, forastero
